headline: Wan Li Portfolio Site
markdown:
I built a portfolio site for UX designer Wan Li, using Angular to do some interesting animations. The site is purely static content i.e. it has no database or back-end.

The finished site can be seen here: <https://liwan.co.uk>

The source code can be found [here](https://github.com/MikeJerred/wan-homesite)
